General.Name: Mincon Group P
General.Description: Mincon Group plc engages in the design, manufacture, sale, and servicing of rock drilling tools and associated products in Ireland, the Americas, Australasia, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. The company offers drill rigs and mast attachments for excavators and skid steers; down the hole (DTH) hammers; DTH drill bits for various rock-drilling applications; rotary drill bits; and construction and geotechnical solutions, including foundation drilling, pipe pile-walls, fore poling, well drilling, and anchoring. It also provides reverse circulation drilling products; drill pipes; and horizontal directional drilling products, including pull reamers and pilot hammers. In addition, the company sells third party products. Its products are used in mining and quarry, construction and geotechnical, mining exploration, water well, geothermal, and horizontal directional drilling applications. The company was formerly known as Manrock plc and changed its name to Mincon Group plc in September 2013. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Shannon, Ireland. Mincon Group plc is a subsidiary of Kingbell Company.
